trans-unit.source:
\n

Creates a new column mapping, using column ordinals to refer to source and destination columns.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx$ xxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The ordinal position of the source column within the data source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The ordinal position of the destination column within the destination table.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Creates a new column mapping, using a column ordinal to refer to the source column and a column name for the target column.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx x xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx$ xxxxx x xxxxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxx x xxxxxx xxxx xxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The ordinal position of the source column within the data source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:

trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x

\n
